SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*,COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY 1) CNT FROM TABLE(POL_GEN_INFO_PKG.ret_pol_listing(#{policyNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cessionDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cedingName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lineClassDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuredDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riskName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objectDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{site, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currencyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalSiLess, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalSiGrt, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalPremLess, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalPremGrt, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CAST(to_timestamp(#{issueDateFrom, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{issueDateTo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{inceptDateFrom, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{inceptDateTo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{expiryDateFrom, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{expiryDateTo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{acctDateFrom, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{acctDateTo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), #{statusDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null, null, null, null, #{lineCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusArrStr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{renTag, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) a WHERE 1=1
AND
UPPER(${col}) LIKE '%' || NVL(UPPER(#{search.value}),UPPER(${col})) || '%'
AND ALT_NO = 0
AND ALT_NO != 0
ORDER BY ${sort.sortKey} ${sort.order}
) a
OFFSET (#{pagination.position} - 1)*#{pagination.count} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pagination.count} * 10 ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TABLE(POL_GEN_INFO_PKG.ret_pol_listing(#{policyNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cessionDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cedingName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lineClassDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuredDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riskName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objectDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{site, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currencyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalSiLess, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalSiGrt, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalPremLess, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalPremGrt, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CAST(to_timestamp(#{issueDateFrom, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{issueDateTo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{inceptDateFrom, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{inceptDateTo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{expiryDateFrom, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{expiryDateTo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{acctDateFrom, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{acctDateTo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), #{statusDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null, null, null, null, #{lineCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusArrStr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{renTag, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) WHERE 1=1
AND
UPPER(${col}) LIKE '%' || NVL(UPPER(#{search.value}),UPPER(${col})) || '%'
AND ALT_NO = 0
AND ALT_NO > 0

mapper.select: SELECT a.quote_id REFERENCE_ID, 'Quotation' MODULE, get_quote_no(a.quote_id) QUOTATION_NO, a.PREPARED_BY, a.ASSIGNED_BY, a.CREATE_DATE, a.UPDATE_DATE FROM QUOTE_GEN_INFO a WHERE a.status = 'P' AND #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} IN (SELECT user_id FROM TABLE(MTN_USERS_PKG.retrieve_quote_approver(a.quote_id,null,null,null,null))) ORDER BY a.CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM TABLE(POL_COVERAGE_ALT_PKG.ret_pol_cover_alt(#{lineCd},#{polYear},#{seqNo},#{cedingId},#{coSeriesNo},#{altNo}, #{position, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order, jdbcType=VARCHAR}))

SELECT * FROM TABLE(POL_GEN_INFO_OC_PKG.ret_pol_gi_oc( #{policyIdOc, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openPolicyNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order, jdbcType=VARCHAR}))

SELECT * FROM TABLE(POL_GEN_INFO_PKG.ret_alt_listing(#{policyId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{position, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sortKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order, jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
mapper.update: BEGIN POL_GEN_INFO_OC_PKG.save_pol_gen_info_oc( #{policyIdOc},#{lineCd},#{ocYear},#{ocSeqNo},#{cedingId},#{coSeriesNo},#{riBinderNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coRefNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{altNo},#{cessionId},#{lineClassCd},#{quoteId},#{refOpPolNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{prinId},#{contractorId}, #{insuredDesc},#{status},#{reinsurerId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{intmId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAST(to_timestamp(#{inceptDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{expiryDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{lapseFrom}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{lapseTo}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{issueDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{effDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{distDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{acctDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE),#{currencyCd},#{currencyRt}, #{createUser},CAST(to_timestamp(#{createDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE),#{updateUser}, CAST(to_timestamp(#{updateDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE),#{projId},#{projDesc}, #{riskId},#{maxSi},#{objectId},#{site},#{duration, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{testing, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionCd},#{provinceCd},#{cityCd},#{districtCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{blockCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{longitude, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{projCreateUser}, CAST(to_timestamp(#{projCreateDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE),#{projUpdateUser}, CAST(to_timestamp(#{projUpdateDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), #{remarks, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ); END;

{CALL #{coInsAlt, mode=OUT, javaType=Integer, jdbcType=INTEGER} := POL_GEN_INFO_PKG.ret_coins_alt(#{policyId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{position, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sortKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) }

{CALL #{coInsStatus, mode=OUT, javaType=Integer, jdbcType=INTEGER} := CONVERT_QU_TO_POL_PKG.ret_coins_status(#{checkingType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policyId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quotationNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sortKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) }

BEGIN POL_GEN_INFO_PKG.update_gen_info(#{policyId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{riskId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coRefNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riBinderNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intmId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longtitude, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAST(to_timestamp(#{updateDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), #{coAltRefNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAST(to_timestamp(#{binderWarrantyDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE) ); END;

BEGIN GEN_POL_PRINT_PKG.to_full_cov( #{policyId}, #{projId}, #{riskId}, #{treatyShare}, #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAST(to_timestamp(#{createDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), #{updateUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAST(to_timestamp(#{updateDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE) ); GEN_POL_PRINT_PKG.to_full_sec( #{policyId}, #{projId}, #{riskId}, #{lineCd}, #{treatyShare}, #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAST(to_timestamp(#{createDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), #{updateUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAST(to_timestamp(#{updateDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE) ); GEN_POL_PRINT_PKG.update_full_cov( #{policyId}, #{treatyShare} ); END;
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TABLE(POL_FULLCOVERAGE_PKG.ret_pol_cover_value(#{policyId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{policyNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{position, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order, jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
mapper.update: BEGIN DIST_EXT_PKG.extract_exp_policy(#{policyId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{polLineCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{polYear, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{polSeqNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{polCedingId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coSeriesNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{altNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAST(to_timestamp(#{fromExpiryDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{toExpiryDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), #{lineCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cessionType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cedingId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extractUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordCount, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER} ); END;
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TABLE(DIST_EXT_PKG.get_exp_policy(#{policyId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processTag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{renewalFlag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{renewable, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extractUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*)>1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM POL_INWARD_BAL where policy_id = #{policyId}

SELECT * FROM TABLE(MTN_BOOKING_MONTH_PKG.get_valid_booking_date( CAST(to_timestamp(#{date1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{date2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE) ))

SELECT * FROM TABLE(POL_GEN_INFO_OC_PKG.ret_create_oc_pol_lov( #{policyIdOc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lineCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{polYear, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{polSeqNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cedingId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coSeriesNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{altNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policyNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openPolNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riskName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ))

SELECT * FROM TABLE(DIST_WPOL_PKG.ret_editable_dist_list( #{lineCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{polYear, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{polSeqNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cedingId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coSeriesNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{altNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policyNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cedingName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riskName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuredDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )) WHERE 1 = 1
AND
UPPER(${col}) LIKE '%' || NVL(UPPER(#{search.value}),UPPER(${col})) || '%'

SELECT * FROM TABLE (POL_GEN_INFO_OC_PKG.ret_create_oc_alt_lov( #{policyIdOc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lineCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{polYear, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{polSeqNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cedingId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coSeriesNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{altNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policyNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openPolNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riskName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )
mapper.update: BEGIN CREATE_OC_ALT_PKG.create_alt_oc(#{policyIdOc}, #{newPolId , mode=INOUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newPolNo, mode=INOUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user}, #{msg, mode=INOUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}); END;
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TABLE(POL_FULLITEM_PKG.ret_pol_itm(#{policyId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{policyNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order, jdbcType=VARCHAR}))

SELECT * FROM TABLE(DIST_WPOL_PKG.ret_move_pol_list_type( #{policyNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAST(to_timestamp(#{bookingFrom, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DATE), CAST(to_timestamp(#{bookingTo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') AS DATE), #{cessionDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalSiFrom, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalSiTo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalPremFrom, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalPremTo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ))
